name: Where is my Time!?
description:
A side scroller game inspired by Jetpack Joyride and Flappy Bird.

Story

Put yourself in the shoes of Nick, a scientist who suffers from a chrono disease after trying to break the barrier between space and time. 

Now his body is innestable and his only chance to survive is to collect the TimeBreakers, little fragments of time. 

Evade as many gadgets as you can and try to get the highest score!

How much will Nick endure?

Controls

Space-> jump

F -> shoot

Esc ->pause

Credits

Programming, Music and Art : Enzo Coletta (BiscupidTea)

SFX : Kenney

Fonts : Font 1, Font 2

Tools: Raylib,  LMMS, Pixelart
